title: HoP 174 - Leading Light - Suhrawardi
itunes:title: HoP 174 - Leading Light - Suhrawardi
description: Suhrawardī, founder of the Illuminationist (ishrāqī) tradition, proposes a metaphysics of light on the basis of his theory of knowledge by presence
